metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16933 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: etc/initsystem/prepare-dirs in Icinga 2.x through 2.8.1 has a chown call for a filename in a user-writable directory, which allows local users to gain privileges by leveraging access to the $ICINGA2_USER account for creation of a link.

criterions.comment: icinga2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
